Package com.web_course.chat_app.api.message

Class MessageController

java.lang.Object
com.web_course.chat_app.api.message.MessageController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="api/v1/messages") public class MessageController extends Object
The type Message controller.
This acts as the endpoint to our Messages API.

    • findBySubString

      @GetMapping("/find/sub_string/{sub}") public List<Message> findBySubString​(@PathVariable("sub") String subString)
      Find messages by sub string list.
      Given a "sub-string", returns all messages that contain this sub-string.
      Parameters:
      subString - the sub string
      Returns:
      the list

    • findUserMessages

      @GetMapping("/find/user/{username}") public List<Message> findUserMessages​(@PathVariable("username") String username)
      Find user messages list.
      Given a useranme returns all of the Messages sent by this user.
      Parameters:
      username - the username
      Returns:
      the list
